name: Humanizer
description: Identifies and removes AI writing patterns to make text sound natural and human-written
longDescription: Plugin with a single `humanizer` skill and a `patterns.md` reference covering 24 AI writing pattern categories: inflated significance, vague attributions, promotional language, AI vocabulary words, copula avoidance, rule of three, em dash overuse, inline-header lists, decorative emojis, chatbot phrases, and sycophantic tone. Goes beyond pattern removal by guiding the addition of authentic voice — opinions, varied rhythm, and specific details. Based on Wikipedia's Signs of AI Writing reference maintained by WikiProject AI Cleanup.
